sources.title: Escape from Angola (1976)
sources.description: Adventure - Moving to the unspoiled terrain of Africa was a risk the Mallory family survived. This family of animal trainers soon find themselves in a desperate struggle for their lives after their truck breaks down deep in the African bush. They split up to search for help, only to find themselves face to face with some of the most dangerous wild animals in Africa: crocodiles, cobras and other deadly beasts. -  Stan Brock, Anne Collings, Steven Tors Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/escape-from-angola-1976/

metadata.Plot: A farmer and his family must flee from Angolan rebels by escaping through hazardous unchartered territory. .
metadata.Actors: Stan Brock, Anne Collings, Steven Tors
